item.description:
Hi Beautiful!


Thank you again for expressing your interest in 

embarking on a deeper journey through Tantra with other love-minded folks.  

 





I want to offer YOU, one who expressed interest directly, 

to receive first dibs on a spot in this more exclusive training.  


I'm excited to share what's in store for you! 

*  6 exclusive, private, 2-hour, experiential Tantra practice (and study)sessions

*  Selected readings for self-study and group sharing/practice
*  A private discussion group just for us! 
*  Discounted private Tantra sessions with me during the course of the program
*  Participation in Ignite Your Heart, Transform Your Relationship (Oct 2012) - first telesummit of its kind! 
*  BONUSES including a free 15-min Astrological birth chart reading with my colleague Peter Panjoyah (he's amazing!)
*  Unlimited mentorship from me via email, as needed during the course of the program 


And the above doesn't address what you will TRULY receive during this program -- 

and that is -- depth of connection with the other participants.  Have you been taking Tantra workshops here and there?  

Dropping in to one and then another a few months later?  Showing up occasionally, 

feeling incredible when you leave, only to return home and have it disappear?  


This program is FOR YOU! 

 





My students and clients have been asking and I am finally ready and 

able to respond.  I, myself, am truly looking forward to exploring deeper 

connection in community; and to sharing my deeper passion and experience with you. 

 





There's also one more VERY EXCITING thing and that is that because YOU inspired me

to develop this program, I am giving you a 
HUGE DISCOUNT. 

 

The Sacred Tantric Fire Advanced Practice Group will run for $497.  But YOU 

my friend, will register for only $297!!!  That's $200 off the regular price.  

They'll only be approximately 10-15 participants, so if you know for sure that 

you are interested, I invite you to register before Friday, September 7th at 

midnight to receive the discount.   

 





The first step to participate is a brief application found here:


http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/MN25VGQ 
 





Once you've completed the application, I will contact you - 

you MUST put your name and email address on your application, thanks!

Feel free to email me with questions:  Robyn@SacredTantricFire.com 

 




The following are the days/times chosen for this course:

Friday, Sept 21st from 7-9 pm
Friday, Sept 28th from 7-9 pm
Friday, Oct 12th from 7-9 pm
Friday, Nov 9th from 7-9 pm
Wednesday, Nov 28th from 7-9 pm
Friday, Dec 7th from 7-9 pm 


Ready to discover deep intimacy and divine connection with a lovely group of people just like you?  

NOTE - there are 7 spots remaining in this exclusive program.  I'm soo excited!!!  

Please share your interest with me ASAP so we can discuss whether this program is a good match for you. 

Couples, singles, any gender preference, relationship style....

ALL ARE WELCOME HERE!

 





With love,

Pushana


P.S.  To avoid this message and others getting stuck in your spam folder, please add Robyn@SacredTantricFire.com to your address book.  Thanks!  

P.S.S.  Payment plans available.
item.name: STF Advanced Tantra Practice Group (multi-session program)
